You are all located in this very generic town. Well, it was generic, until the mafia came in and most of the town left. But thirteen of you remain to thwart the mafia's plans of total domination. Can you find the mafia and lynch them? Will your town ever be free of menace? Will I ever stop asking questions?

Still Alive

Parama
Scumhunter
MattP

Not So Much

mykonian, townie, killed Night 3
FightingShadow, mafia roleblocker, lynched Day 4

Game Status
Game Over

Rules
1. No outside communication about this game unless your role permits it.
2. Don't quote your Role PM. Don't fake-quote it, either. Paraphrasing is fine.
3. Do not edit your posts.
4. To vote somebody, bold your vote, such as vote: ChaosOmega. If your vote isn't bolded, it will not count. Unvotes are not necessary to change your vote.
5. During the day, a player will be lynched when they have more than 50% of the players currently alive voting for them. Once that amount has been reached, they're dead. No unvotes will save them. Players can post in the thread up until I post the lynch scene and the thread is locked.
6. Once it has been posted by me that you are dead, you're dead. Do not post any more, not even a bah post.
7. Every day will have a rigid deadline of 2 weeks. The only way an extension will be granted is if I deem it necessary due to extenuating circumstances.
8. Nights will have a deadline of 3 days. If you have a night action and do not send one, you will do nothing. If that is what you want to do, you should tell me that so that night can be wrapped up more quickly.
9. If you're going to be gone for longer than a 72-hour period, post in-thread letting everyone know for how long.
10. If 72 hours pass without a player posting or saying they will be absent, I will prod them if requested to do so by any other player.
11. If a player would receive a fourth prod (unless it is their first prod of the day) or they have not responded to a prod within 24 hours, I will search for a replacement for them.
12. Blue is my color. Don't use it. Also, no small or invisible text.
13. Please PM me if you have any questions about the game.
14. Have fun.
15. If anyone breaks any of the aforementioned rules, I have complete control over the actions that will be taken.

Sample Townie Role PM
You are a Townie. Your only weapons are your mind and your vote. Use them wisely.

You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and at least one member of the town is still alive.

Please confirm by sending your role to me via PM.
Role PM's are going out now. When I have received 10/13 confirmations, Day 1 will begin.

Well, today was it, you thought. The day that everyone would go outside and finally concede to listen to the booming voice that keeps saying:

Day 1 has started. With 13 alive, it takes 7 to lynch.

The deadline for Day 1 is exactly two weeks from this post.
